title: The Best Romantic Comedies to Watch on Netflix
description: From My Best Friend's Wedding to The Perfect Find, these are the best rom-coms to stream on Netflix now.

title: Americans Had Imaginary Girlfriends Long Before AI Companions
description: Long before AI-generated sweethearts, the dead maidens of the 19th century gave Americans someone to pine for—but their impact went beyond just romance.

description: It’s a relatively new virus that’s been geographically contained.

description: President Biden launched a blistering attack on his predecessor.

description: Dictionary.com added new 2024 words including bed rotting, girl dinner, barbiecore, and mid.

title: Jon Stewart Could Reinvigorate The Daily Show—If the Material Can Live Up to His Delivery
description: Stewart nailed his performance of Biden-Trump material that could feel a bit stale despite clever quips and self-aware asides.

title: How a New U.N. Advisory Group Wants to Transform AI Governance
description: At a panel discussion at the World Governments Summit in Dubai, members of the new advisory group shared their perspectives on AI governance.

title: As the Ice Melts, Polar Bears Are Failing to Find Enough Food on Land
description: Denied ice platforms to hunt for seals, the great predators are becoming land scavengers.

description: Yann LeCun discusses the barriers to achieving AGI, Meta’s open-source approach, and AI risk.

description: Lyz Lenz, author of This American Ex-Wife, on how financial dependence keeps women trapped in marriages they want to leave

title: The Risk of America Abandoning Ukraine
description: The Senate passed the $95.3 billion aid package for Ukraine, Israel, and Taiwan. But the bill's future in the House remains uncertain.

description: A new report details how both sides of the U.S.-China rivalry have boosted their defense spending in the past year.

description: From broken water infrastructure to billion-dollar funds, Michael Regan is on a mission for lasting change.

title: Financial Literacy Is the Civil Rights Issue of This Generation
description: John Hope Bryant wants to equip every citizen with the tools and knowledge necessary to navigate the complex world of money and finances.

title: How Mardi Gras Traditions Helped New Orleans’ LGBTQ Communities Thrive
description: The celebrations created space for people to subvert gender norms, as New Orleans' LGBTQ communities built new traditions of their own.

description: Every business needs to show that it is focussed on delivering results, not just making commitments, writes Mars CEO Poul Weihrauch.

description: The trip marks the latest sign of growing ties between the two countries across trade, defense, and more.

title: U.S. Senate Passes $95 Billion Military Aid Package for Ukraine, Israel, and Taiwan After Rare All-Night Session
description: The bill's passage came after a rare all-night session and caps months of difficult negotiations and internal GOP divisions.

title: Russia Just Declared a Western Leader a ‘Wanted Person’
description: The move against Estonia's Prime Minister marks the first time the nation has brought a case against a foreign leader.

description: Holly Hollman writes a case against  school chaplains.

title: Why People Love Snow So Much
description: It's fleeting, it's a feast for your senses, and it breaks us out of our routines.

title: Fears Among U.S. Jews Over Safety and Antisemitism Surge, Survey Finds
description: Nearly two-thirds of American Jews feel less secure than they did a year ago, a new survey by the American Jewish Committee found.

title: Hamas Built Tunnels Beneath My Family’s Home in Gaza. Now It Lies in Ruin
description: Now it lies in ruin alongside countless other homes in northern Gaza.

title: 5 Things to Know About Blackpink’s Lisa, Who Will Make Her Acting Debut in The White Lotus

title: Indian Farmers and Police Clash in New Delhi Over Crop-Prices Protest
description: The clashes come more than two years after Prime Minister Modi withdrew controversial agriculture laws that triggered protests in 2021.

title: Australia Proposes Doxxing Ban After Jewish Group Exposed by Pro-Palestinian Activists
description: Australia’s Attorney-General said the laws—which have yet to be drafted—would involve issuing take-down notices to social media platforms and imposing fines for the intimidation tactic.

title: Thailand’s Thaksin, Controversial Ex-Leader Jailed Six Months Ago, Set for Early Release
description: The ex-prime minister convicted of graft meets the criteria for a suspension of his remaining sentence as he’s more than 70 years old and is suffering from chronic illness, authorities said.

title: 2024 Super Bowl Shatters Viewership Record to Become Most-Watched U.S. TV Program Ever
description: Kansas City’s overtime victory over San Francisco averaged 123.4 million viewers across television and streaming platforms, shattering last year’s viewership record.

title: In Bid to Tighten Grip on GOP, Donald Trump Endorses Daughter-in-Law for RNC Co-Chair
description: Donald Trump has proposed that his son Eric’s wife Lara—alongside RNC general counsel Michael Whatley—replace RNC chairwoman Ronna McDaniel, who is in talks to step down.

title: New York City Subway Station Shooting Latest: Gunman at Large, 1 Killed, 5 Injured
description: At least one shooter remains at large after one person was killed and 5 others wounded following a dispute at a train platform in the Bronx.
